i kings.gloss: the first of two Old Testament books telling the histories of the kings of Judah and Israel

ike.gloss: United States general who supervised the invasion of Normandy and the defeat of Nazi Germany

ikhanaton.gloss: early ruler of Egypt who rejected the old gods and replaced them with sun worship (died in 1358 BC)

ikon.gloss: a visual representation (of an object or scene or person or abstraction) produced on a surface
